snippet.title: Cairn Mathair's Curse - Mother Direct Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
Cairn: Mathair's Curse is a turn-based JRPG inspired by Scottish culture. Set in Albaness, Alex and his friends explore locations, solve puzzles and defeat strange and unusual enemies in their adventure!

WISHLIST ON STEAM → https://store.steampowered.com/app/1302530/Cairn_Mathairs_Curse/

FOLLOW ON TWITTER → https://twitter.com/CairnCurse

WEBSITE → cairngame.com

#indiegame #jrpg #games #pcgaming #earthbound #motherdirect #pcgames #newtrailer #trailer #pixelart
